channel.title: Need to fix this restarter thingy
channel.description:
ok this code here @echo off cls echo Stopping Server... tskill java /a echo Restarting Server... title m4g3scape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls
is like normal it kicks ppl then it runs server but it doesnt do just starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594
it does Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594
but it ment to do... starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594 it only does that wen it has the JAVA -Xmx1024m thing is in the runserver idk how to fix it u try that run ur server after u put @echo off cls echo Stopping Server... tskill java /a echo Restarting Server... title m4g3scape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls
into a .bat file and name it anythin but put in your source folder run ur server and then open this while it open and ull c wat i mean i think lol yea otherwise i get javaheap space error

item.title: Need to fix this restarter thingy
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

thnx :D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 01:39:00 AM[/size][hr]uh yea i just found out it dnt kick ppl -.-

item.source: Need to fix this restarter thingy

item.title: Need to fix this restarter thingy
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Lol what you did is you never told it to echo out those commands. It just auto maticly does them. And when it says: server shutdown / server restarted or w/e, then you did cls at the end. This is gonna clear the sheet so the commands wont show. Take away “cls” and add “pause” in it’s place. Also this code is not working right because there is not timer. If you want a good restarter, you have to program it in scheudled tasks or in the actual source code. Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fix this restarter thingy

item.title: Need to fix this restarter thingy
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

ok this code here
@echo off
cls
echo Stopping Server…
tskill java /a
echo Restarting Server…
title m4g3scape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls

is like normal it kicks ppl then it runs server but it doesnt do just
starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594

it does
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594

but it ment to do…
starting testscape 0.0.0.0:43594 it only does that wen it has the JAVA -Xmx1024m thing is in the runserver idk how to fix it u try that run ur server after u put
@echo off
cls
echo Stopping Server…
tskill java /a
echo Restarting Server…
title m4g3scape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls

into a .bat file and name it anythin but put in your source folder run ur server and then open this while it open and ull c wat i mean
i think lol yea otherwise i get javaheap space error
